    • Method Detail

      • getAuthenticatedUserItems

        QiitaPageResponse<java.util.List<Item>> getAuthenticatedUserItems(int page,
                                                                  int perPage)
                                                           throws QiitaException
        Returns the items which the authenticated user posted in descending order of creation time. Need saccess token.
        Parameters:
        page - the page number(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        perPage - the amount of users included per page(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        Returns:
        the items which the authenticated user posted
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • getItemsByQuery

        QiitaPageResponse<java.util.List<Item>> getItemsByQuery(int page,
                                                        int perPage,
                                                        java.lang.String query)
                                                 throws QiitaException
        Returns the items which matched the query in descending order of creation time. Can be used even with unauthenticated.
        Parameters:
        page - the page number(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        perPage - the amount of users included per page(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        query - the search query
        Returns:
        the items which matched the query
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • postItem

        QiitaResponse<Item> postItem(java.lang.String body,
                             boolean coediting,
                             boolean gist,
                             boolean isPrivate,
                             java.util.List<Tagging> tags,
                             java.lang.String title,
                             boolean tweet)
                      throws QiitaException
        Creates and returns new item. Needs access token.
        Parameters:
        body - the markdown format body
        coediting - whether this item is coediting(only in Qiita:Team)
        gist - whether to post code in the text to Gist(only when GitHub linkage is enabled)
        isPrivate - whether this item is private(invalid in Qiita:Team)
        tags - the item tags
        title - the item title
        tweet - whether to post to twitter(only when Twitter linkage is enabled)
        Returns:
        the new created item
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • deleteItem

        void deleteItem(java.lang.String itemId)
         throws QiitaException
        Deletes the item. Needs access token.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the target item identifier
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • getItem

        QiitaResponse<Item> getItem(java.lang.String itemId)
                     throws QiitaException
        Returns the item. Can be used even with unauthenticated.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the target item identifier
        Returns:
        the got item
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • updateItem

        QiitaResponse<Item> updateItem(java.lang.String itemId,
                               java.lang.String body,
                               boolean coediting,
                               boolean isPrivate,
                               java.util.List<Tagging> tags,
                               java.lang.String title)
                        throws QiitaException
        Updates and returns the item. Needs access token.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the target item identifier
        body - the updated markdown format body
        coediting - whether this item is coediting(only in Qiita:Team)
        isPrivate - whether this item is private(invalid in Qiita:Team)
        tags - the updated item tags
        title - the updated item title
        Returns:
        the updated item
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • deleteLike

        void deleteLike(java.lang.String itemId)
         throws QiitaException
        Deletes like from the item. Needs access token for Qiita:Team.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the target item identifier
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      throws QiitaException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • isStocked

        boolean isStocked(java.lang.String itemId)
        Returns whether the authenticated user is stocking the item. Needs access token.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the target item identifier
        Returns:
        returns the authenticated user is stocking the item

      • isLiked

        boolean isLiked(java.lang.String itemId)
        Returns whether the authenticated user likes the item. Needs access token for Qiita:Team.
        Parameters:
        itemId - the target item identifier
        Returns:
        returns the authenticated user likes the item

      • getItemsByTag

        QiitaPageResponse<java.util.List<Item>> getItemsByTag(java.lang.String tagId,
                                                      int page,
                                                      int perPage)
                                               throws QiitaException
        Returns the items attached the tag in descending order of tagged date. Can be used even with unauthenticated.
        Parameters:
        tagId - the target tag identifier
        page - the page number(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        perPage - the amount of items included per page(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        Returns:
        the items attached the tag in descending order of tagged date
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • getUserItems

        QiitaPageResponse<java.util.List<Item>> getUserItems(java.lang.String userId,
                                                     int page,
                                                     int perPage)
                                              throws QiitaException
        Returns the items which the user posted in descending order of creation date. Can be used even with unauthenticated.
        Parameters:
        userId - the target user identifier
        page - the page number(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        perPage - the amount of items included per page(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        Returns:
        the item which the user posted
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable

      • getUserStocks

        QiitaPageResponse<java.util.List<Item>> getUserStocks(java.lang.String userId,
                                                      int page,
                                                      int perPage)
                                               throws QiitaException
        Returns the items which the user stocked in descending order of stocked date. Can be used even with unauthenticated.
        Parameters:
        userId - the target user identifier
        page - the page number(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        perPage - the amount of items included per page(perPage > 0 && perPage <= 100)
        Returns:
        the items which the user stocked
        Throws:
        QiitaException - if arguments are incorrect or Qiita API is unavailable
